name: Extra push
description:
A short puzzlescript game about pushing an unpushable block with another pushable block. (had a bit of writer's block today with ideas for mechanics so  the main mechanic is less interesting then I would of liked)

Mobile friendly version:  https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=009239403da7210b1e9d1f221fe7e4a0

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=009239403da7210b1e9d1f221fe7e4a0

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
